citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care.
citations.narrative:
A written program of veterinary care was not available for review at the time of inspection. The facility employs an
attending veterinarian on a part-time basis who is responsible for overseeing the veterinary care provided to all the
animals at the facility; however, there is no written program documented regarding veterinary care for these animals. A
written program of veterinary care for part-time attending veterinarians is crucial to ensure animals are receiving proper
medical care and that the facility is following their attending veterinarian's guidance. The registrant must develop a written
program of veterinary care for all regulated animals at the facility in accordance with 2.33(a)(1). Correct by September 6,
2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
CHRISTINA RADZAI, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.33(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care. 
A written program of veterinary care was not available for review at the time of inspection. The facility employs an 
attending veterinarian on a part-time basis who is responsible for overseeing the veterinary care provided to all the 
animals at the facility; however, there is no written program documented regarding veterinary care for these animals. A 
written program of veterinary care for part-time attending veterinarians is crucial to ensure animals are receiving proper 
medical care and that the facility is following their attending veterinarian's guidance. The registrant must develop a written 
program of veterinary care for all regulated animals at the facility in accordance with 2.33(a)(1). Correct by September 6, 
2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors:
